original_text:
One runner runs to meet another,
    and one messenger to meet another,
to tell the king of Babylon
    that his city is taken on every side;
korean_text: 보발꾼은 보발꾼을 맞으려고 달리며 전령은 전령을 맞으려고 달려가 바벨론의 왕에게 전하기를 그 성읍 사방이 함락되었으며

sentences.original_text: One runner runs to meet another
sentences.korean_translation: 한 달리는 자가 다른 달리는 자를 만나러 달려가고

sentences.original_text: and one messenger to meet another
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사자가 다른 사자를 만나러 달려가고

sentences.original_text: to tell the king of Babylon
that his city is taken on every side
